field.label: Authors
field.hint: Last name, e.g. Smith First name ( e.g. Donald Jr. Use the ‘add’ button after each name to create the list.

field.label: Editors
field.hint: Editor of book. Can enter multiple names.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter full title as appears on work.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Corresponds with type listed in Baker Institute Research Library, if applicable.
field.required: You have to provide the type.

field.label: Content Format
field.hint: Most resources are text. When there are multiple entries, choose primary format. 'Moving Image' refers to video files.
field.required: You have to provide the content format.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Defaults to English. Can include multiple languages.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter keywords one at a time. Use button after each keyword to create the list.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Article Number
field.hint: Many online-only journals publish articles that have article numbers rather than unique page ranges.

field.label: Number of last page (if applicable)
field.hint: Not every article has a page range. Increasingly, the publishers only list the first number (since it’s digital-born)

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher. If published by Baker Institute, use “Rice University’s Baker Institute for Public Policy”

field.label: Publisher Location
field.hint: If item is Book or Book Chapter, enter publisher location, e.g. New York, NY.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers associated with it. When available, DOI (digital object identifier) MUST be entered.

field.label: Link to Baker Institute Research Library
field.hint: If this item is also found in Baker Institute Research Library, include URL.

field.label: Affiliated Rice lab (s), center (s), or institute (s)
field.hint: Enter name of affiliated Rice lab (s), center (s), or institute (s). Enter names one at a time. Use button after each name to create the list.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter the name of conference.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter conference date. YYYY-MM-DD.

field.label: Version of Work
field.hint: “Pre-print” is the first draft of the work, before peer-review. “Post-print” is the version submitted to the publisher after peer-review. “Publisher version” is the version of record, as found in print or on the publisher’s website.

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Last name, e.g. Smith First name (s) + “Jr,” e.g. Donald Jr

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter full title as appears on article.
field.required: You must enter a Title for this item.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Date published or first used in classroom. If only year is known, leave month and day fields blank.
field.required: You must enter Date of issue for this item.

field.label: Resource Type
field.hint: Select one term, use most primary type.
field.required: You must enter Resource Type for this item.

field.label: Content Format
field.hint: Most resources are text. When there are multiple entries, choose primary. ‘Moving image’ refers to video files.
field.required: You must enter Content Format for this item.

field.label: Language
field.required: You must enter Language for this item.

field.label: Discipline
field.required: You must enter Discipline for this item.

field.label: Audience
field.required: You must enter Audience for this item.

field.label: Education Level
field.required: You must enter Education Level for this item.

field.label: Size
field.hint: Enter page count (e.g. 12 pp) if PDF.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers associated with it. When available, DOI (digital object identifier) MUST be entered.

field.label: Version of Work
field.hint: “Pre-print” is the first draft of the work, before peer-review. “Post-print” is the version submitted to the publisher after peer-review. “Publisher version” is the version of record, as found in print or on the publisher’s website.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter the name of conference.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter conference date. YYYY-MM-DD

field.label: Content Format
field.hint: Select the appropriate term from the dropdown list. Most often, this will be Dataset, defined as "data encoded in a defined structure."
field.required: You must enter Content Format for this item.

field.label: Title of Dataset
field.hint: In the cases of datasets connected to a single published study, article or dissertation (such as replication or supplemental data), use the published name of the piece.
field.required: You must enter a Title of Dataset for this item.

field.label: Subtitle of Dataset
field.hint: If your data is supplemental and/or for replication purposes, check the appropriate box(es). If neither apply, please check “Dataset.”
field.required: You must enter a Subtitle of Dataset for this item.

field.label: Creator(s) of the dataset
field.hint: Last name, e.g. Smith First name (s) + “Jr,” e.g. Donald, Jr

field.label: Affiliated Rice entity
field.hint: Lab, center, institute or department affiliated with the creation of the dataset.

field.label: Language of the dataset
field.required: You must enter Language of the dataset for this item.

field.label: Time period covered by the data
The geographic location(s) covering the data
Date of publication or distribution of the dataset
field.hint: When republishing datasets, use the original date the data was made publicly accessible.

field.label: Data description
field.hint: Description may include information about the context of the data collection (such as bibliographic citation of the study and data), scope of the study (topics, geography, time), methodology of data collection, sampling and processing, data access information, and information on the accompanying, deposited materials.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter keywords to describe the dataset, one at a time. Use the ‘add’ button after each keyword to create the list.

field.label: Related publications
field.hint: Human-readable, standard bibliographic citations for any publications relating to or referencing the data. If available, please include article DOI or permanent URL.

field.label: Patent ID
field.hint: Use the most complete version of the ID without spaces or commas. (e.g. US6428811B1).
field.required: You must enter Patent ID for this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Title of the patent taken from the published version.
field.required: You must enter a Title for this item.

field.label: Inventor(s)
field.hint: Enter name(s) as appear on patent e.g. Smalley, Richard E.
field.required: You must enter an Inventor for this item.

field.label: Assignee(s)
field.hint: Inventor and the assignee may be the same. Rice University may be one of the assignees.
field.required: You must enter an Assignee for this item.

field.label: Date Filed
field.required: You must enter Date Filed for this item.

field.label: Date Issued by the USPTO
field.required: You must enter Date Issued by the USPTO for this item.

field.label: Abstract
field.required: You must enter Abstract for this item.

field.label: Type of Patent
field.required: You must enter Type of Patent for this item.

field.label: Page Count
field.hint: Enter number of pages in patent PDF (e.g. 19 pp).
field.required: You must enter Page Count for this item.

field.label: Language
field.required: You must enter Language for this item.

field.label: Publisher
field.required: You must enter Publisher for this item.

field.label: Content Format
field.required: You must enter Content Format for this item.

field.label: Resource Type
field.required: You must enter Resource Type for this item.

field.label: Technical Specs
field.required: You must enter Technical Specs for this item.

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Last name, e.g. Smith First name ( e.g. Donald Jr. )

field.label: Editors
field.hint: Editor of book. Can enter multiple names.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Article or chapter title. Enter full title.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.required: You have to provide the type.

field.label: Content Format
field.hint: Most resources are text. When there are multiple entries, choose primary format. 'Moving Image' refers to video files.
field.required: You have to provide the content format.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Defaults to English. Can include multiple languages.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter keywords one at a time. Use button after each keyword to create the list.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher.

field.label: Publisher Location
field.hint: If item is Book or Book Chapter, enter publisher location, e.g. New York, NY.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers associated with it. When available, DOI (digital object identifier) MUST be entered.

field.label: Affiliated Rice lab (s), center (s), or institute (s)
field.hint: Enter name of affiliated Rice lab (s), center (s), or institute (s). Enter names one at a time. Use button after each name to create the list.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: If grant-funded, list name of sponsor (s) and funding number (s). Enter the name of sponsor and award number one at a time. Use button after each sponsor to create the list.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter the name of conference.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter conference date. YYYY-MM-DD.

field.label: Author
field.required: You must enter an Author for this item.

field.label: Original Publisher
field.required: You must enter a publisher for this item.

field.label: Date
field.hint: Year of publication. Use Date and Time Formats (W3C-DTF) http://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime/ [YYYY].
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Series title plus volume, issue and date. E.g. News From Fondren: Volume 22, No. 2, Spring 2013.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Digital Identifier
field.hint: Filenaming convention: acronym + Volume No. +Issue No. e.g. nff17no1.pdf.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Defaults to English. Can include multiple languages.

field.label: Rights
field.required: You have to provide the Rights.

field.label: Rights Url
field.required: You have to provide the Rights Url.

field.label: Type
field.required: You have to provide the Type.

field.label: Genre
field.required: You have to provide the Genre.

field.label: Pages
field.hint: No. of pages in PDF. e.g. 14 pp
field.required: You have to provide the Pages.

field.label: Electronic Publisher
field.required: You have to provide the Electronic Publisher.

field.label: Subject
field.required: You have to provide Subject.

field.label: Content Format

field.label: Language
field.hint: Defaults to English. Can include multiple languages.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter keywords one at a time. Use button after each keyword to create the list.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Article Number

field.label: Number of last page (if applicable)
field.hint: Not every article has a page range. Increasingly, the publishers only list the first number (since it’s digital-born)

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher.

field.label: Publisher Location
field.hint: If item is Book or Book Chapter, enter publisher location, e.g. New York, NY.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: Include any associated identification numbers. When available, DOI (digital object identifier) MUST be entered. DOIs must include the prefix http://dx.doi.org/.

field.label: Link to Published Version
field.hint: Enter full link if published version does not have a DOI, but does have a unique URL, handle, etc.

field.label: Affiliated Rice lab (s), center (s), or institute (s)
field.hint: Enter name of affiliated Rice lab (s), center (s), or institute (s). Enter names one at a time. Use button after each name to create the list.

field.label: Sponsor Name
field.hint: If grant-funded, list name of sponsor(s), e.g. National Institutes of Health. Enter the name of sponsor one at a time. Use the ‘add’ button after each sponsor to create the list.

field.label: Funding Number
field.hint: If grant-funded, list unique identifier for award(s) + Funder name(s) in parentheses, e.g. R01 EB007813 (National Institutes of Health). Enter the identifier one at a time. Use the ‘add’ button after each award to create the list.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter the name of conference.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: If paper presented at conference, enter conference date. YYYY-MM-DD.

field.label: Version of Work
field.hint: “Pre-print” is the first draft of the work, before peer-review. “Post-print” is the version submitted to the publisher after peer-review. “Publisher version” is the version of record, as found in print or on the publisher’s website.
